resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Project:Great Scientists</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Project:Great Wissenschaftler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Scientifiques de Project:Great</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cientistas De Project:Great</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienziati Di Project:Great</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Project:Great επιστήμονες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Científicos De Project:Great</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guide for an intermediate English student project where they research the life and work of a famous scientist .The project includes written and oral presentations. Assessment rubrics, time schedule , checklist and reflection forms are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientists</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Anleitung für ein englisches 
Kursteilnehmerzwischenprojekt, in dem sie die Lebensdauer erforschen 
und Arbeit eines berühmten Wissenschaftler The Projektes die 
geschriebenen und Munddarstellungen einschließt. Einschätzung 
Rubriken, Zeitplan, Checkliste und Reflexion Formulare werden zur 
Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un guide pour un projet anglais 
intermédiaire d'étudiant où ils recherchent la vie et le travail 
d'un projet célèbre de The de scientifique inclut des présentations
écrites et orales. Des rubriques d'évaluation, le calendrier, 
la liste de contrôle et les formes de réflexion sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma guia para um projeto inglês 
intermediário do estudante onde pesquisem a vida e o trabalho de um 
projeto famoso do The do cientista inclua apresentações escritas e 
orais. Os rubrics da avaliação, a programação de tempo, a 
lista de verificação e os formulários da reflexão são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida per un progetto inglese 
intermedio dell'allievo dove ricercano la vita ed il lavoro di un 
progetto famoso del The dello scienziato include le presentazioni 
scritte ed orali. Le rubriche di valutazione, i tempi previsti, 
la lista di controllo e le forme di riflessione sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας οδηγός για ένα ενδιάμεσο αγγλικό 
πρόγραμμα σπουδαστών όπου ερευνούν τη ζωή και την εργασία ενός 
διάσημου επιστήμονα. Το πρόγραμμα περιλαμβάνει τις γραπτές 
και προφορικές παρουσιάσεις. Οι μορφές ρουμπρικών 
αξιολόγησης, χρονικού προγράμματος, πινάκων ελέγχου και 
αντανάκλασης παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía para un proyecto inglés 
intermedio del estudiante donde investigan la vida y el trabajo de un 
proyecto famoso del The del científico incluye presentaciones 
escritas y orales. Se proporcionan las rúbricas del gravamen, 
el horario de tiempo, la lista de comprobación y las formas de la 
reflexión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaftler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">scientifiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cientistas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienziati</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
